item.title: Docker Advent 2015
item.description: Here is summary all posts from Docker Advent in 2015: Day One - What’s docker? Day Two - Open Container Ekosystem Day Three - Docker install and upgrade Day Four - Docker Machine Day Five - Docker Compose Part 1 Day Six - Docker Hub Day Seven - Dockerfile Day Eight - Docker Compose Part 2 Day Nine - Docker Registry Day Ten - Docker Swarm Day Eleven - Docker Version Manager Day Twelve - CircleCI and Docker Day Thirteen - Docker and TravisCI Day Fourteen - Docker Lifecycle Day Fifteen - Container Lifecycle Day Sixteen - Using docker for CLI Tools Day Seventeen - Docker and Sphinx documentation Day Eighteen - Docker and Heroku Day Nineteen - Docker and AWS ECS Day Twenty - Docker and Tutum Day Twenty One - Docker and logging Day Twenty Two - Docker and monitoring Day Twenty Three - Docker tips and tricks Day Twenty Four - Docker Advent Summary 2015

item.title: Migrate Heroku NodeJS website to Heroku Docker
item.description: I’m using docker for some time. I like Heroku. Heroku introduction docker support and I try at PragueJS website. Prerequisites You need heroku toolbelt and install plugin for docker heroku plugins:install heroku-docker Install boot2docker and run it boot2docker up Development Create Dockerfile for your nodejs app heroku docker:init Start development server heroku docker:start First run and these errors: Step 0 : RUN npm install ---> Running in 102e9de70ce6 npm WARN package.

item.title: Git productivity tips
item.description: I’m using git for 5 years. I have many aliases and commands for better work with git. I used git command still quite often. $ history | awk '{CMD[$2]++;count++;}END { for (a in CMD)print CMD[a] " " CMD[a]/count*100 "% " a;}' | grep -v "./" | column -c3 -s " " -t | sort -nr | nl | head -n20 1 2521 25.2125% git 2 776 7.76078% gco 3 582 5.

item.title: DNSmasq in Mac OS X 10.10 Yosemite
item.description: Dnsmasq I use dnsmasq at mac to setup all development sites using address as something.dev Install If you have new computer, only install dnsmasq. brew install dnsmasq If you have older computer and upgrade from maverics. You have installed dnsmasq some time ago. Please, first remove dnsmasq and install them again. In Yosemite are some changes in plist for running services. brew uninstall dnsmasq brew install dnsmasq For Yosemite is good have latest LauchRocket.
